system.description: “The universe called — it wants its encryption key back.” Spend up to 5 Hope to make up something about a character or adversary and (GM descretion) it becomes true.  The more Hope spent, the more outlanding the thing made up can be.
system.effect: Spend up to 5 Hope to make up something about a character or adversary and (GM descretion) it becomes true.  The more Hope spent, the more outlanding the thing made up can be.
system.blurb: “The universe called — it wants its encryption key back.”
